long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TextStash: Your Essential Text Management Tool for Easy Copying, Organization, and Notes
🔍 Say goodbye to the hassle of managing your texts! TextStash is a powerful extension designed to help you easily save, copy, and organize your text snippets, as well as jot down quick notes, making your work and daily tasks smoother than ever.

💰 Pricing and Trial Information:
🆓 14-Day Free Trial: Experience all features of TextStash for free for 14 days.
💳 One-Time Purchase: After the trial, choose to purchase a one-time license for continued access.
💼 Activation Process: Payment is made via PayPal. After payment, send the invoice to sahernaji@gmail.com for activation within 24 hours.

🔒 Your Privacy and Security Matter:
💡 We prioritize your privacy and security. Here’s what you need to know:
⭐ Limited Access: TextStash securely stores your text snippets and notes, ensuring that your data is only accessible within the extension.
⭐ Transparent Permissions: TextStash requires permission to read and write data locally, essential for managing your saved texts and notes.
⭐ No Data Collection: We do not collect, store, or transmit any personal information. All your texts and notes are stored securely on your device.
⭐ Regular Updates: We continuously update TextStash to maintain compatibility with the latest security standards.
💡 Your trust is important to us. If you have any questions or concerns about security or how the extension works, please contact our support team. We’re here to help!

Key Features:
⭐ Easy Text Saving: Quickly save any text snippet with just a few clicks, ensuring you never lose important information.
⭐ Simple Copying: Effortlessly copy texts for easy pasting into other applications.
⭐ Organized Text Management: View, edit, and manage your saved texts in an intuitive interface.
⭐ Sticky Notes Integration: Jot down quick thoughts or reminders directly within TextStash, keeping everything in one place.
⭐ Customizable Text Fields: Create and organize text fields according to your preferences, making it easier to find what you need.
⭐ Search Functionality: Instantly search through your saved texts and notes to locate specific snippets quickly.
⭐ User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy a clean, easy-to-navigate design that enhances your overall experience.

Why Install TextStash?
🚀 Save Time: No more juggling multiple documents or notes. TextStash brings all your texts and notes together in one place.
🚀 Improve Efficiency: Quickly access important information and copy it when you need it, streamlining your workflow.
🚀 Stay Organized: Manage your text snippets and sticky notes effortlessly, ensuring you can find and use them whenever necessary.
🚀 Tailored to Your Needs: Whether you’re a student, professional, or anyone needing text management, TextStash adapts to your requirements.
🚀 Enhance Your Daily Tasks: With fast access to your saved texts and notes, you can focus more on your work and less on finding the right information.

💼 Install TextStash today and transform how you manage and use your texts and notes. Let technology simplify your tasks while you concentrate on what matters most!
